/* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/anchor-is-valid */ /* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/alt-text */ import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useDispatch ,useSelector} from 'react-redux'; import { Formik } from "formik"; import axios from "axios"; import {fetchconnectuser,selectoneuser,selectSessionUser} from "../../../redux/slices/userSlice"; function FormBody({ titleTxt = "Create Post", btnTxt = "Share", onSubmit, post = {}, setopenPopup, groupid }) { console.log("groupe" + groupid); const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(() => { dispatch(fetchconnectuser()); }, [dispatch]); const connecteduser=useSelector(selectSessionUser)[0]; post.username = connecteduser._id; return ( { return ( <>

{titleTxt}

{/* {showEmoji && (
{chosenEmoji ? ( You chose: {chosenEmoji.emoji} ) : ( No emoji Chosen )}
)}*/}
Add to your post
setFieldValue("image", e.target.files[0])} >
Live {btnTxt}
Share
); }} > ); } export default FormBody;
